capture.title: Neonatal biometric capture
capture.desc: Optical sensor adapted to newborns, 500 ppi and clinical effective area.

ergonomic.title: Ergonomic design
ergonomic.desc: Designed for safe, comfortable, and quick use at the bedside.

standards.title: Connectivity and standards
standards.desc: Compatible with HL7-FHIR and DICOM to integrate into clinical systems.

clinical.title: Secure clinical environment
clinical.desc: TLS encryption, permissions, and auditing to comply with healthcare regulations.
